About me

Let me introduce myself

Hi, I'm Maxim Snoeys, student Application Development in Geel. My interest mostly lay in the webdevelopment side of things.

With my knowledge of electronics from highschool I like to make some stuff for my DIY racing simulator and drone. Also, I like to cook delicious things!

This portfolio is a work in progress, there might be some rough edges here and there :)
